item.description:
We have changed the date and time for our Chanukah Party because the Great Room was not available for the 27th!

We have the Media Room and the Great Room with plenty of space to mingle, enjoy homemade latkes and the trimmings, and exchange gifts! There will be great music and dancing and as always lots of fun!

Please RSVP as soon as possible so we can finalize the details!
item.name: Let's Have a Chanukah Party!!
